bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of heat-type diseases affecting the large intestine. Zhen zhu nang 珍珠囊 1: 黃芩瀉大腸火 , “ Huang qin drains fire [affecting the] large intestine ”. Da chang mi 大腸秘 , tightness of the large intestine [1]

Illness Sign identical with da bian mi 大便秘① , constipation. Ben cao yan yi 本草衍義 Substance Entry xing he ren 杏 核仁：治肺燥喘熱，大腸秘，潤澤五臟 , “They cure lung dryness with panting and fever, as well as tightness of the large intestine , and they moisten the five depots”.
